name: INSIDE Virgin Atlantic New UPPER CLASS *A350 SUITES*
description:
Head to https://squarespace.com/trektrendy to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain using code TREKTRENDY

Come with me onboard Virgin Atlantic's new Upper Class onboard their Airbus A350. I'm on one of the very first flights over to the US since the travel restrictions have lifted. I'll take you with me through the private wing at London Heathrow, into the Club House... relax in a cabana and even check out the rooftop garden overlooking the runway. Next we'll head onboard to my private suite, in Upper Class on the way to Atlanta, USA.
